root: ^Hi Kat, I came by as promised for that offer from yesterday.
^I can't wait to try more of your family's delicious cooking.
^Oh Hanae, I have some bad news.
^We unfortunately don't have any more ingredients to make the food. All the flowers we tried to pick ourselves have gone bad for some reason.
^I think it's because we were Royal Flower Pickers that all the herbs and vegetables we had have all expired.
^Oh no. I hope there is a way I can help.
^Actually I think there might be something I can do. Pink flowers are very good at preserving food. I can gather some to help with this situation.
^If you don't mind, that would be a great help.
^I'll try to be fast about it.
